text: Sterculia hypochroa is a tree species described by Pierre, belonging to the genus Sterculia and the family Malvaceae (previously the Sterculiaceae, now relegated to a subfamily). No subspecies are listed in the Catalogue of Life. These trees are found in Vietnam, where they are known as trôm quạt. == References == Pierre, 1888 In: Fl. For. Cochinch. Fasc. 12 (1888) t. 185 ==External links== * * hypochroa Category:Flora of Indo-China Category:Trees of Vietnam
title: Sterculia hypochroa
